name: HellFire (itch) (CheeseGrtr)
description:
CoreGamesLink: https://www.coregames.com/games/1beb5d/hellfire

This is a game made over the course of 3 weeks for the Core Student GameDev Hackathon by Daniel Johnsen and Jordan Grider.

Theme:

The theme for the Jam was 2020: The Game, so we made an homage to the multiplayer arena shooters we played during the pandemic. It's loosely based on Doom, one of Daniel's favorites, and we tried to emulate the fun frenetic gameplay of the types of games that got us through 2020. Hope you enjoy!

Description:

A competitive online arena shooter for up to 10 players. Annihilate the competition with a variety of deadly guns. Will you come out victorious? Or burn in the lava with the rest? Play HellFire now to find out!!

Thank you for reading and good luck to everyone involved!!!
